BR_text.BRsummary: Excess INFO messages to console in latest build
BR_text.BRdescription:

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ffbin>@ffbin</denchmark-link>
  is this related to your recent change?

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ericl>@ericl</denchmark-link>
  This log  is related to this PR. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/8401>#8401</denchmark-link>
  I will take a look, thanks.

comments_2.comment_text:
When exits, the ipython shows the following:
 <denchmark-code>WARNING: Logging before InitGoogleLogging() is written to STDERR
 I0527 11:13:03.308390 13014 13014 redis_client.cc:167] RedisClient disconnected.
 I0527 11:13:03.308455 13014 13014 redis_gcs_client.cc:97] RedisGcsClient Disconnected.
 I0527 11:13:03.308652 13014 13014 service_based_gcs_client.cc:83] ServiceBasedGcsClient Disconnected.
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Does this expect?

comments_3.comment_text:
and got the following warning, when ray.init():
 <denchmark-code>WARNING services.py:924 -- Redis failed to start, retrying now.
 </denchmark-code>
